snippet: Mickelson called on his younger brother, Tim, when his longtime caddie, Jim Mackay, fell ill after 12 holes at the World Golf Championships event in Mexico....

headline.main: Nikola Vucevic Scores 25 Points, Magic Beat Heat 110-99
headline.print_headline: Nikola Vucevic Scores 25 Points, Magic Beat Heat 110-99

lead_paragraph: Mickelson called on his younger brother, Tim, when his longtime caddie, Jim Mackay, fell ill after 12 holes at the World Golf Championships event in Mexico.
